org.grouplens.lenskit.basic

Class TopNItemRecommender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemRecommender
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.TopNItemRecommender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemRecommender

    public class TopNItemRecommender
extends AbstractItemRecommender
    Recommender that recommends the top N items by a scorer. Implements all methods required by AbstractItemRecommender. The default exclude set is all items rated by the user.

    Recommendations are returned in descending order of score.

    Since:
    1.1

      • getScorer

        public ItemScorer getScorer()

      • recommend

        protected java.util.List<ScoredId> recommend(long user,
                                             int n,
                                             LongSet candidates,
                                             LongSet exclude)
        Implement the ID-based recommendation in terms of the scorer. This method uses getDefaultExcludes(long) to supply a missing exclude set.
        Specified by:
        recommend in class AbstractItemRecommender
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        n - The number of items to return, or negative to return all possible items.
        candidates - The candidate set, or null to use a default set of candidates.
        exclude - The set of excluded items, or null to use the default exclude set.
        Returns:
        A scored list of item IDs.
        See Also:
        ItemRecommender.recommend(long, int, Set, Set)

      • recommend

        protected java.util.List<ScoredId> recommend(int n,
                                             SparseVector scores)
        Pick the top n items from a score vector.
        Parameters:
        n - The number of items to recommend.
        scores - The scored item vector.
        Returns:
        The top n items from scores, in descending order of score.

      • getDefaultExcludes

        protected LongSet getDefaultExcludes(long user)
        Get the default exclude set for a user. The base implementation gets all the items they have interacted with.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        Returns:
        The set of items to exclude.

      • getDefaultExcludes

        protected LongSet getDefaultExcludes(@Nullable
                                     UserHistory<? extends Event> user)
        Get the default exclude set for a user. The base implementation returns all the items they have interacted with (from UserHistory.itemSet()).
        Parameters:
        user - The user history.
        Returns:
        The set of items to exclude.

      • getPredictableItems

        protected LongSet getPredictableItems(long user)
        Determine the items for which predictions can be made for a certain user. This implementation is naive and asks the DAO for all items; subclasses should override it with something more efficient if practical.
        Parameters:
        user - The user's ID.
        Returns:
        All items for which predictions can be generated for the user.
